text: Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ma? Youren ceng dui tamen shuo:`Nimen dang zhizhi ziji de wuli, dang jin shou bai gong, dang wanna tian ke.'Dangzhenzhu yi kangzhan wei tamen de dingzhi de shihou, tamen zhong you yibufen ren weiju diren, youru weiju zhenzhu, naizhi gengjia weiju. Tamen shuo:`Women de zhu a! Ni weisheme yi kangzhan wei women de dingzhi ne? Ni weishenme bu rang women yanchi dao yige linjin de riqi ne?'Ni shuo:`Jinshi de xiangshou, shi xiewei de; hou shi de baochou, duiyu jingwei zhe, shi geng hao de. Nimen bu shou-sihao kui wang.'
